description: Conclusion of the two-part breaking point story. Ranma trains against Ryoga`s new technque by blocking the stings of bees. Cologne kidnaps Akane to lure Ranma to a duel with Ryoga.

titles.title: Bakusai Tenketsu to wa? Ryouga Daigyakushuu
The Breaking Point!? Ryoga`s Great Revenge
爆砕点穴とは? 良牙大逆襲
